welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vlist, a charming city known for its scenic canals and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Vlist has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Schiphol Airport, mainly used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal caters to VIP and private aircrafts.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
